MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ToPoint (this MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary dictionary, out System.Drawing.PointF point);
.method public static hidebysig bool ToPoint(class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary dictionary, valuetype System.Drawing.PointF point) cil managed

Docs.summary: Turns the contents of an NSDictionary into an PointF.
Docs.returns: True if the NSDictionary contained a single point element, false otherwise.
Docs.remarks: Use this method to turn an NSDictionary that was previously created from a PointF using the ToDictionary extension method back into a point.
